p: To the solution of 6-amino-2-chloroquinoline- 3-carbaldehyde (1mol) and p-toluene in 15 mL methanol was added 1 mL of acetic acid. The reaction mixture was refluxed for 5–6 h. Completion of the reaction was inferred through TLC, after which, it was cooled, the precipitate formed, and the product of 3-( P -tolylimino)methyl-2-chloroquinoline-6 amine (3g) separated. It was filtered off, dried, and crystallized with ethanol. m.p. 176 °C. Yield: 86%. Color: darkbrown.
